Description: Monsoon rains led to flooding in several low-lying areas of Mumbai.
Intense rainfall resulted in waterlogging and disrupted transportation.
A residential building collapse led to casualties and rescue operations.
The impact of Cyclone Nisarga caused strong winds and power outages.
A major bridge collapse resulted in transportation disruptions.
A landslide in a hilly area near Mumbai affected traffic on a major highway.
Continuous rain led to severe flooding in several parts of the city.
A major fire broke out in a commercial complex in Mumbai's business district.
An extreme heatwave with temperatures exceeding 44Â°C affected the city.
A terrorist attack on a prominent Mumbai location led to casualties and chaos.
